TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Rule extends Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.RuleSchema implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.IProjectSchemaNode, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public NotInheritable Class Rule Inherits RuleSchema Implements IProjectSchemaNode, ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 用于表示工具、自定义生成规则和 PropertyPage 等的架构信息。

span.span: Used to represent the schema information for a Tool, a Custom Build Rule, a PropertyPage, and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常表示为 XAML 的磁盘上，每个每个项目引擎 （解决方案） 的 XAML 文件中保留此类的一个实例。Typically represented on disk as XAML, only one instance of this class is maintained per XAML file per project engine (solution). 如果你手动实例化此类，调用设置对象的第一个属性前和设置的最后一个属性后。If you manually instantiate this class, call before you set the first property of the object and after you set the last property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AdditionalInputs { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 当此 表示一个生成自定义项时，此字段定义要针对此生成自定义项目标计算的附加输入的列表（各项之间用分号分隔）。

span.span: When this represents a Build Customization, this field defines the semicolon-separated list of additional inputs to be evaluated for the Build Customization target.

value.span: 返回附加输入的列表（各项之间用分号分隔）。

span.span: Returns a semicolon-separated list of additional inputs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段是可选的。This field is optional.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Categories As List(Of Category)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::List<Microsoft::Build::Framework::XamlTypes::Category ^> ^ Categories { System::Collections::Generic::List<Microsoft::Build::Framework::XamlTypes::Category ^> ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::Generic::List<Microsoft::Build::Framework::XamlTypes::Category ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此 中的属性属于的 类别的列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of categories that the properties in this belong to.
Returns the list of properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段是可选的。This field is optional. 字段返回只能为类别显式定义的和不包含任何自动生成的类别。The field returns only the categories that were explicitly defined and that do not contain any auto-generated categories. 当中这包含声明其类别为不在此列表中，存在则，具有该名称被自动生成并添加到类别的内部列表。When a that is contained in this declares its category to be something that is not present in this list, then a that has that name is auto-generated and added to the internal list of categories. 此字段不返回该自动生成的类别。That auto-generated category is not returned by this field.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CommandLine { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 当此 表示一个生成自定义项时，此字段表示一个命令行模板，生成自定义项任务将使用此模板来调用工具。

span.span: When this represents a Build Customization, this field represents the command-line template to be used by a Build Customization task to invoke the tool.
Returns the command-line template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段是可选的。This field is optional.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Framework::XamlTypes::DataSource ^ DataSource { Microsoft::Build::Framework::XamlTypes::DataSource ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Framework::XamlTypes::DataSource ^ value); };

span.span: The for the properties in this .

summary.span: 在本地为某个属性定义的任何数据源将重写此设置。

span.span: This is overridden by any data source that is defined locally for a property.
Returns the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你不必指定此字段，如果所有的单个属性都具有本地定义的数据源。You do not have to specify this field if all individual properties have data sources defined locally.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置供预期的 UI 客户端使用的此 的说明。

span.span: Gets or sets a description of this for use by a prospective UI client.
Returns the description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段是可选的它是区分区域性的。This field is optional and is culture-sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可由预期 UI 客户端用来显示此 的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets a name that can be used by a prospective UI client to display this .
Returns the name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段是可选的它是区分区域性的。This field is optional and is culture-sensitive. 如果未设置此属性，它分配相同的值属性 （和，因此，将不会本地化）。When this property is not set, it is assigned the same value as the property (and, therefore, would not be localized).

summary.span: 返回 XAML 指定的 类别和自动生成的 类别的联合。

span.span: Returns the union of XAML specified categories and auto-generated categories.

summary.span: 后者是从由此规则中的属性引用的任何缺失类别创建的。

span.span: The latter are created from any missing categories that are referred to by the properties in this Rule.

summary.span: 自动生成的 类别仅设置其名称。

span.span: The auto-generated categories only have their names set.
Returns the union of categories.

summary.span: 当此 表示一个生成自定义项时，此字段表示一条消息，在生成过程中执行一个生成自定义项之前将显示该消息。

span.span: When this represents a Build Customization, this field represents the message to be displayed before a Build Customization is executed during the build.
Returns the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段是可选的。This field is optional.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FileExtension { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary GetPropertiesByCategory() cil managed

summary.span: 返回已划分到各个类别中的所有属性的字典。

span.span: Returns a dictionary of all properties partitioned into categories.

returns.span: 返回一个字典，其中的键是 名称，值是该类别中的属性的列表。

span.span: Returns a dictionary whose keys are the names and whose values are the list of properties in that category.
The returned value is never .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的列表可能包含自动生成的类别。The returned list may contain auto-generated categories. 如果（或其派生的类），则为其生成的新类别引用未指定的属性。If a (or its derived classes) refer to a property that is not specified, then an new Category is generated for it. 如果没有类别指定的属性，该属性将"常规"类别中。If no category is specified for the property, then the property is put in the "General" category. 类别列表中的都完全匹配的 XAML 文件中指定。The list of categories is exactly as specified in the XAML file. 自动生成类别来自后指定类别，但没有严格的顺序。The auto-generated categories come after the specified categories but in no strict order.

Returns the UI template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于将此字段设置的值可以是任何内容，只要它预期的呈现模板的识别。The value used to set this field can be anything as long as it is recognized by the intended rendering template. 此字段是必需的仅当此规则旨在显示为属性页。This field is required only if this Rule is meant to be displayed as a property page.
